contents:
No intension of finding anyone. Anyway don't need ...

All right, thanks, I am sorry.

However, yes, I prepare to die outside of evil PRC.
Driving Uber? Oh, my life goals are so simple, as you know, first, I don't want to be a Chinese for rest of my life, second, of course I wish CCP can finish ASAP.

However, without CCP, I still don't want to go China, and I won't call myself Chinese.

So, no matter where I live, I feel happy, ok? stay away from CCP and China, and Chinese language, I feel freedom, I am not slave of CCP, China, and Chinese cultures and Chinese languages...

Hell NO!
